title: Little Lemon Website
subtitle: Meta Frontend Capstone Project
description: A conceptual capstone project for the Meta Front-End Developer Course, illustrating the Little Lemon restaurant. Includes a user-friendly interface for exploring the menu, and making reservations (design only).

carouselItems.captionText: Built with a fully responsive layout, ensuring optimal viewing on all devices.
Implements the Google Maps API to display interactive location data.
A robust reservation form featuring client-side validation using Yup and Formik.

keyFeatures.title: Key Pages:
items: 🏠 Home: Welcoming introduction to Little Lemon.
📖 About: Learn about the history and team.
🍽️ Menu: Explore the food and drink options.

technologies.title: Technologies Used:
items: 🎨 CSS: Responsive design with custom styles.
🗺️ Google Map API: Interactive map integration.

title: Wordle Game Website
subtitle: CSC 337 Final Group Project
description: Leading the development for this CSC 337 project at the University of Arizona, I built the backend with Express.js and MongoDB, and provided key revisions to the React frontend.

carouselItems.captionText: Interactive game interface for the Wordle platform.
Displays top player scores with real-time updates.
Allows users to manage profiles and secure password changes.

technologies.title: Technologies Used:
items: 📚 Express.js: Web framework for handling routes and middleware.
🍃 MongoDB: NoSQL database for storing user data and game state.
🔐 Passport.js: Authentication middleware for handling login and sessions.

contributions.title: Project Contributions:
items: 📋 Leading and Developing a platform for Wordle, featuring dynamic game state management and leaderboards.
🚀 Building backend services with Express and managing game/user data with MongoDB.
🌐 Deploying the webpage on DigitalOcean, securing it with HTTPS and implementing password security using bcrypt.

title: My Portfolio Website
subtitle: Well, you're here!
description: This website serves as my personal portfolio, designed to highlight my web development skills and projects. It is structured with a Home page, detailed Portfolio sections, and a Contact page.

carouselItems.captionText: Clean, responsive design with animations and a dark/light mode toggle.
Detailed project descriptions with images, GitHub links, and live demos.
Contact me via the form or email at dongyoung.yangkr@gmail.com

keyFeatures.title: Key Features:
items: 📧 Contact: Form and email for easy communication.
✨ Responsive Design: Ensuring optimal viewing on all devices.

technologies.title: Technologies Used:
items: 🎨 CSS & SCSS: For unique styling and animations.
📧 EmailJS: For seamless contact form functionality.

contributions.title: About This Site:
items: I developed this site to effectively present my skills and projects.
Each Portfolio section provides in-depth information about my work, including descriptions, images, and links.
The Contact page allows visitors to easily reach out to me.
